SELECT id, store_name FROM `user` WHERE id IN (SELECT create_user FROM goods_bulk WHERE shoe_id = #{shoeId})

SELECT u.store_name, u.address, u.score, COUNT( DISTINCT wb.want_id ) AS wantBuyCount, COUNT( DISTINCT g.gs_id ) AS goodsCount, COUNT( DISTINCT gb.gsb_id ) AS goodsBuldCount FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN want_buy wb ON u.id = wb.create_user LEFT JOIN goods g ON u.id = g.create_user LEFT JOIN goods_bulk gb ON u.id = gb.create_user WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY u.id

SELECT gb.shoe_id, gb.size, gb.price, gb.create_time, gb.create_user, sb.`name`, sb.brand, sb.number, sb.img, sb.sell_num FROM goods_bulk gb LEFT JOIN shoe_bulk sb ON gb.shoe_id = sb.id WHERE gb.create_user = #{userId}
